questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Pets and indoor scenes

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a room
D) In a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A cat playing with a toy
B) A cat sitting beside stack of papers and book while resting the paws on it
C) A cat eating food
D) A cat sleeping on a bed

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The papers on the table
B) The window
C) The cat
D) The book

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A cat
C) A window
D) A book

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A bookshelf
B) A garden
C) A window with a view outside
D) A painting

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A cat
B) A vase of flowers
C) A computer
D) A chair

What type of animal is in the photo?
A) Dog
B) Bird
C) Cat
D) Rabbit

What is the cat sitting on?
A) A chair
B) A stack of papers and a book
C) A bed
D) A rug

What is the title of the book visible in the photo?
A) "Modern Physics"
B) "Integrated Chinese"
C) "World History"
D) "Basic Mathematics

What part of the cat is highlighted by the sunlight?
A) Its tail
B) Its whiskers
C) Its ears
D) Its paws

What is visible through the window in the background?
A) A busy street
B) A garden or trees
C) A beach
D) A mountain

How is the lighting in the photo?
A) Dark and gloomy
B) Bright and sunny
C) Artificial and harsh
D) Soft and dim

What is the condition of the window?
A) Clean and clear
B) Slightly dirty with smudges
C) Broken and cracked
D) Covered with curtains

What is the color of the cat's fur?
A) Black
B) White
C) Grey
D) Brown

What is the texture of the cat's fur as shown in the photo?
A) Smooth and shiny
B) Rough and tangled
C) Fluffy and soft
D) Wet and matted

What is the surface that the cat is sitting on?
A) A wooden table
B) A metal shelf
C) A plastic chair
D) A glass desk

What is the cat looking at?
A) Outside the window
B) Directly at the camera
C) At the book
D) At a toy on the floor

What is the primary color of the wall in the background?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) White
D) Yellow

What is the condition of the papers under the cat?
A) Stacked Together and few are out of the stack
B) Scattered and messy
C) Torn and crumpled
D) Missing

What is the cat's posture?
A) Lying down
B) Sitting upright
C) Standing on all fours
D) Jumping

Is there any visible text in the photo?
A) Yes, on the book
B) Yes, on the wall
C) Yes, on the window
D) No

What is the likely purpose of the book in the photo?
A) Entertainment
B) Education
C) Decoration
D) Repair

Is there any indication of human presence in the photo?
A) Yes, a person's hand
B) Yes, a shadow
C) No, only the cat is visible
D) Yes, a reflection in the window

What is the cat's position relative to the window?
A) In front of the window
B) Next to the window
C) Behind the window
D) Far from the window

What is the cat's eye color?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Brown
D) Amber

What is the most prominent feature of the cat in the photo?
A) Its tail
B) Its whiskers
C) Its paws
D) Its ears

What is the direction of the sunlight in the photo?
A) From the left
B) From the right
C) From above
D) From below

What is the condition of the wall in the background?
A) Clean and smooth
B) Dirty and stained
C) Covered with wallpaper
D) Painted with patterns

What is the texture of the papers under the cat?
A) Glossy
B) Matte
C) Textured
D) Laminated

What is the cat's position in relation to the book?
A) Sitting beside the books with front paws resting on books
B) Next to it
C) Behind it
D) In front of it

What is the overall color scheme of the photo?
A) Warm tones
B) Cool tones
C) Neutral tones
D) Bright and vibrant tones

A) Perfectly clean
B) Slightly dirty
C) Very dirty
D) Missing

What book is visible in the photo?
A) A novel
